section.para: To view Quantities on Hand by Location, select the "Quantities on Hand by Location" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Quantities on Hand by Location, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Quantities on Hand for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Quantities on Hand by Location you want to display.
Specify Location whose Quantity on Hand you want to display. Displays Quantity on Hand for selected Location.
Indicates whether Location is Netable or not.
Indicates whether Location is Restricted or not.
Display lists Quantities on Hand by Location, using the specified parameters. If S/O Reservations by Location has been enabled, then reservation quantities will be displayed by Sales Order.
